Education

Our Traveller Service can help Gypsy, Traveller, Fairground and Circus parents with getting their children into school.

The Traveller Service has teachers and home/school support staff who can help with attendance issues and supporting Gypsy/Traveller children whilst they are in schools in enter council name

The Service also supports schools by giving advice and guidance and In Service Training for schools working with Gypsy/Traveller children and home/school support in developing partnership with Gypsy/Traveller parents.
